textTemplates.description: SMS - #5b – Sent e-sign (4 hours after e-sign is sent)
textTemplates.name: SMS_5b_Sent_e_sign_4_hours_after_e_sign_is_sent
textTemplates.text: We sent paperwork awhile ago, wanted to make sure you received it. Please call {!$Organization.Phone} with questions. Saddle Rock Legal Group

textTemplates.description: SMS - #5c – Sent e-Sign (1 day after e-Sign is sent)
textTemplates.name: SMS_5c_Sent_e_Sign_1_day_after_e_Sign_is_sent
textTemplates.text: Did you see the e-Sign agreement email we sent? Please reply here, or give us a call at {!$Organization.Phone}. Thanks! Saddle Rock Legal Group

textTemplates.name: SMS_A_T_Talc_Welcome_Letter
textTemplates.text: Hi, Saddle Rock here. If you haven't received your welcome email for the Talcum Powder case, call 888-427-9607. Check your spam folder just in case.

textTemplates.name: SMS_Case_Verification
textTemplates.text: Hi, this is Saddle Rock Legal Group, your law firm for your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Please call us immediately at {!$Organization.Phone}. Thanks!

textTemplates.name: SMS_Case_Verification_Expiring
textTemplates.text: This is Saddle Rock Legal Group, the firm working on your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Call us at {!$Organization.Phone} as quickly as possible, thanks!

textTemplates.name: SMS_Contact_Day_Final_Attempt
textTemplates.text: Hi, this is Saddle Rock Legal Group. We've been calling about your inquiry. We will be closing the file unless we hear from you at {!$Organization.Phone}.

textTemplates.name: SMS_Contact_Follow_Up
textTemplates.text: Hello {!$Record.litify_pm__First_Name__c}, this is Saddle Rock Legal Group, calling for a possible {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. Call {!$Organization.Phone}!

textTemplates.name: SMS_Error_on_file
textTemplates.text: Hi this is Saddle Rock Legal Group, we signed with you for a preliminary review. We need to clarify some information. Please call {!$Organization.Phone}!

textTemplates.name: SMS_Sent_by_Mail
textTemplates.text: We mailed out important paperwork regarding your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case. If you have any questions, please call {!$Organization.Phone}. Thank you.

textTemplates.name: SMS_Sent_E_Sign
textTemplates.text: We recently sent out paperwork to get your {!$Record.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case moving forward. Please call {!$Organization.Phone} as soon as possible!

textTemplates.text: Saddle Rock Legal following up on your ongoing Talcum Powder case, let us know if there are any updates to your file @ 888-427-9607.
